Title: Excludes tenant-shareholders in cooperative housing corporations from certain housing provisions
Summary: Excludes tenant-shareholders in cooperative housing corporations from certain housing provisions, fixing certain unintended effects of the Housing Stability and Tenant Protection Act of 2019.
LawCode: Amd §7-108, Gen Ob L; amd §§227-f, 238-a, 234 & 235-e, RP L; amd §702, RPAP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, the real property law, and the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to excluding tenant-shareholders in cooperative housing corporations from certain housing provisions
